entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Escoumins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:41 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Escoumins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain near midnight then to flurries overnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
